name: CHHapticPattern.Key
desc: Constants that define the keys you use to create a haptic pattern dictionary.

items.name: static let event: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the beginning of a haptic event definition.

items.name: static let eventDuration: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the duration of an event.

items.name: static let eventParameters: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the beginning of an array of fixed parameter definitions.

items.name: static let eventType: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the type of event.

items.name: static let eventWaveformPath: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the path to the local file that contains the audio waveform.

items.name: static let eventWaveformUseVolumeEnvelope: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies whether audio file playback fades in and out using an envelope.

items.name: static let parameter: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the beginning of a parameter definition.

items.name: static let parameterCurve: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the beginning of a parameter curve definition.

items.name: static let parameterCurveControlPoints: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the control points of a parameter curve.

items.name: static let parameterID: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the parameter ID.

items.name: static let parameterValue: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the value of a parameter.

items.name: static let pattern: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the beginning of a haptic pattern definition.

items.name: static let time: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies the relative time for an event or parameter, in seconds.

items.name: static let version: CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: A key that identifies rhe version number of a haptic pattern dictionary.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a pattern key with a string.
